text: AmaYuda namaKhristu athi: “Thina singabantwana baka- Allâh neentandane zaKhe”. Yithi: “Utheni kaloku Enohlwaya nje ngezono zenu?” Nakanye! Nina ningabantu abangabanye babo Wabadalayo, Yena Uxolela lowo Athande ukumxolela, Ohlwaye lowo Athande ukumohlwaya yaye loluka-Allâh ulongamelo lwamazulu nomhlaba nako konke okuphakhathi kwawo, kananjalo ziza kubuyela kuYe (zonke izinto)
